seo.encrypt-description: Baro sida sirta AES ula shaqeyso jileeyaha tallaabo-tallaabo ee AES Adventure.
seo.decrypt-description: Baro sida furida AES ay ula shaqeyso AES Adventure's simulator-tallaabo.
seo.expand-description: Baro sida balaadhinta furaha AES ula shaqeyso jileeyaha tallaabo-tallaabo ee AES Adventure.
seo.feedback-description: Sii jawaab celintaada qiimaha leh hal-abuurka AES Adventure si aan u wanaajino khibradda qof walba.
seo.guide-description: Baro sida aad uga faa'iidaysan lahayd AES Adventure.
seo.home-description: Ku soo dhawoow AES Adventure, qalab waxbarasho oo dareen leh AES.
seo.settings-description: Beddel sida AES Adventure u eg yahay si uu ugu habboonaado baahiyahaaga.

home.description: Heerarka sirta sare waa kan ugu caansan sifaynta-furaha.

settings.title: Dejinta
settings.badLang: Luuqadaada si liidata ma loo turjumay mise lama heli karo?

intro.body: Heerarka sirta sare waa a simmetric block cipher, taasoo la macno ah inay sirayso/qorito baloogyada cabbirka go'an oo leh hal fure oo keliya. Fiiro gaar ah: Dhammaan xogta AES Adventure waxay u taagan tahay hexadecimal;

animations.body: Dhammaan jilayaasha waxay isticmaalaan animations si ay si cad u muujiyaan tallaabo kasta oo habka.

tutorials.body: Dhammaan simulatorsku waxay leeyihiin astaamo waxbarasho oo ku kala firirsan.

configuration.body: Simulatorada sirta iyo furista waxay taageertaa qaabaynta xaddidan oo ay isticmaali karaan isticmaalayaasha horumarsan si ay ugu tijaabiyaan AES. Habee Modal dhanka bidix ee boggan. Fiiro gaar ah: bedelida qaabeynta waxay dib u dajin doontaa simintirada iyo simulators decryption

persistence.body: Dhamaan xaalada AES Adventure waxa lagu kaydiyay browserkaga kaydinta deegaanka oo leh furayaal ka bilaabma 'AES_ADVENTURE_UI__'. kaydinta deegaanka oo dib u cusbooneysiinaya bogga.

duplicate-buttons.body: Marka aagga wax gelinta ahi buuxo, waxaad arki doontaa 1 ama 2 nuqul badhamada icon. Fiiro gaar ah: haddii hawlgalka nuqulku wax ka beddelo gelinta, jileeyaha bartilmaameedka ayaa dib loo dajin doonaa maadaama aan la beddeli karin jilitaanka dhexe.

i18n.body: Luuqadda abka oo dhan waxa lagu beddeli karaa 'Settings'

quick-points.cant-input: Xog gelinta lama beddeli karo haddii jileeyaha uu hadda isticmaalayo.
quick-points.cant-start: Simulators lama bilaabi karo ilaa dhammaan aagagga wax gelinta loo baahan yahay laga buuxiyo.
quick-points.small: Adventure AES waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu daawado shaashadaha ugu yaraan 13" cabbir ahaan.

feedback.title: Jawaab celin
feedback.body: Kani waa mashruuc horumarinaya waxaanan jeclaan lahayn inaan ka helno jawaab celintaada qalabka.

modal.title: Habee
modal.body: Hoos ka dooro qaabaynta Fiiro gaar ah: bedelida qaabeynta waxay dib u dajin doontaa simintirada iyo simulators decryption

simulator.no-mix-columns-last: Demiyay sababtoo ah Isku-dhafka Tiirarka ayaa laga booday wareegii u dambeeyay!
simulator.no-mix-columns-first: Demiyay sababtoo ah Mix Columns waa laga booday wareegga koowaad!
simulator.no-step-configuration: Demiyay sababtoo ah qaabeynta la doortay ayaa ah
simulator.no-h-function-key-size: Demiyay sababtoo ah cabbirka furuhu maaha 256 bits!
simulator.no-h-function-last: Demiyay sababtoo ah ‚Ñé-function waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu soo saaro kelmadda 5aad laakiin kaliya 4 kelmadood ayaa la soo saaray wareega ugu dambeeya!
simulator.disabled-input: Guji badhanka 'Dib u habeyn' si aad awood ugu yeelato tafatirka
simulator.disabled-start: Buuxi gelinta(yada) si aad awood ugu yeelatid jilitaanka

default.description: Guji {tutorialIcon} oo aad aragto si aad u muujiso macluumaadka khuseeya halkan.

plaintext-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro jaantuska gobolka kaas oo lagu shaqeyn doono inta lagu jiro habka sirta.

ciphertext-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro jaantuska gobolka ee lagu shaqeyn doono inta lagu jiro habka kala saarida.

key-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro vector-ka gobolka kaas oo lagu dhejin doono inta lagu jiro habka balaadhinta muhiimka ah. Jadwalka furaha ee AES wax yar ayuu isu beddelaa cabbir kasta oo fure ah, laakiin had iyo jeer waa eray-oriented.

add-key.body: Furaha waxa lagu xardhay shaxanka gobolka. caddaynta furaha.

add-round-key.body: Furaha wareega waxa lagu XOR oo la socda jaantuska gobolka. Balaadhinta Furaha tab si aad u barato sida furayaashan wareega loo sameeyo. sir, furayaasha wareega waxaa loo isticmaalaa sida ay u kala horreeyaan. decryption, furayaasha wareega waxaa loo isticmaalaa gudaha lid ku ah dalbo.

add-words.body: Erayga ugu horreeya waxa lagu xardhay ereyga u dambeeya, ka dib Wareegga ùëî-shaqo ayaa lagu baaqay. 256-bit Jadwalka muhiimka ah wuxuu ku baaqayaa Wareegga ‚Ñé-ku shaqaynayo kelmadda 4-aad ee ka soo baxday wareegga ka hor inta aan loo sii wadin sidii caadiga ahayd.
add-words.note: The ùëî-shaqo iyo ‚Ñé-Xisaabinta shaqada ayaa lagu qeexay talaabooyinka wareega ee soo socda.

round-g-fn.body: The ùëî-shaqadu waxay ka kooban tahay hawlo taxane ah oo ku saabsan bytes-ka ereyga gelinta: Beddelka Bytes, Shift Rows (shift = 1), iyo byte ugu horreeya waxaa lagu XOR wareeg joogto ah.

round-h-fn.body: The ‚Ñé-shaqadu waxay ka kooban tahay Beddelka Bytes on bytes ee erayga gelin.

round-keys.body: Furayaashan hoose waxa loo qaataa siday u kala horreeyaan marka la qarinayo. decryption, waxaa loo isticmaalaa si ka soo horjeeda.

rounds-header.body: AES waxay ku shaqeysaa shaxanka gobolka wareegyo. marka laga reebo wareega ugu dambeeya, oo aan ku jirin isku dhafka Columns. decryption, tillaabooyinka waxaa lagu fuliyay gudaha lid ku ah Dalabka iyo Isku-dhafka Tirooyinka kuma jiraan wareegga koowaad.

key-rounds-header.body: Wareeg kasta oo AES ah wuxuu u baahan yahay fure-hoosaad, oo lagu daray 1 caddaynta furaha.
key-rounds-header.aes-a: Adventure AES wuxuu u kala baxaa wareeg kasta ku dar Erayada, Wareega ùëî-shaqo iyo Wareeg ‚Ñé-tallaabooyinka shaqada. 256-bit jadwalka muhiimka ah wuxuu isticmaalaa Wareegga ‚Ñé-tallaabo shaqo wareeg kasta, marka laga reebo wareegga ugu dambeeya.
key-rounds-header.note: Wareeg kasta waxa uu soo saaraa 1 subkeys oo ah cabbirka muhiimka ah ee 128-bits, 1.5 subkeys ee 192-bits, iyo 2 subkeys ee 256-bits, marka laga reebo wareegga u dambeeya oo soo saara 1 subkeys dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah.

rounds-stats.diffusion:
Faafsanaan waa saamaynta hal qoraal oo cad ku leeyahay qoraalka (hadda). baraf saamayn.
Safafka Shift and Mix Columns waxaa laga yaabaa in si wadajir ah loo tixraaco sida lakabka fidsan sababtoo ah waxay yihiin talaabooyinka faafin ee ugu weyn ee AES.
rounds-stats.confusion:
Jahawareer waa xidhiidhka ka dhexeeya qoraallada (hadda) iyo furaha.
Beddelka Bytes wuxuu soo bandhigaa jahawareer AES.

sub-bytes.body: Beddelka Bytes-ka wuxuu ku beddelaa byte-ga matrix-ka gobol kasta oo leh byte ka soo baxay sanduuqa beddelka, kaas oo bixiya aan toos ahayn ee AES (ka ilaalinta weerarrada falanqaynta). decryption, waxaan isticmaalnaa kuwa gaarka ah rogan ee sanduuqa beddelka.

shift-rows.body: Shift Rows wuxuu sameeyaa wareeg wareeg ah oo caqli gal ah saf kasta oo ka mid ah shaxanka gobolka. decryption, isbedelku wuxuu ku jiraa lid ku ah jihada.

mix-columns.body: Isku-dhafka Tiirarka waxa uu ku dhuftaa halbeeg kasta oo ka mid ah tiiradaha shax-goboleedka iyadoo loo eegayo jaangooyooyin joogto ah si loo soo saaro tiirka u dhigma ee matrix-ka gobolka ee ka dhashay. decryption, waxaan isticmaalnaa kuwa gaarka ah rogan ee matrix joogto ah.

state-to-ciphertext.body: Talaabada ugu danbeysa waa in la abuuro ciphertext kaas oo ah soo saarida habka sirta.

state-to-plaintext.body: Talaabada ugu danbeysa waa in la abuuro qoraal cad oo ah wax soo saarka habka kala saarista

state-to-round-keys.body: Tallaabada ugu dambeysa waa in la abuuro furayaasha wareega kuwaas oo ah wax soo saarka habka ballaarinta muhiimka ah.

hexArea.duplicated-keys: Lagu koobiyeeyay dhammaan agabyada muhiimka ah
hexArea.duplicated-plaintext: La koobiyeeyay si loo sireeyo galinta
hexArea.duplicated-ciphertext: La koobiyeeyay si loo furfuro gelinta
